content.html: I was behind a guy at a CVS Pharmacy, looking sick as anything and tells pharmacist he probably has COVID, two people in his house have it and he wants to get tested. When the pharmacist asked why he wasn't wearing a mask, he said "Because we no longer have the mask mandate..
content.value: I was behind a guy at a CVS Pharmacy, looking sick as anything and tells pharmacist he probably has COVID, two people in his house have it and he wants to get tested. When the pharmacist asked why he wasn't wearing a mask, he said "Because we no longer have the mask mandate..
